::KitKat::

She heard the transmission and sighed,"No rest for the wicked, but 
with being this busy, who's got time to be wicked even."  She opened 
the link."Yes, I have a chamber that you may use. But you will have 
to leave all your weapons outside of the entrance. And you will be 
heavily watched. Understand?" She looked down. "yeah, that idea of a 
vacation is looking better all the time."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>   Gabriel had many wounds. Magnus saw this and contacted Kit 
Kat.."We have a 
> hurt bot here. May we use your cr chamber?"
>   Gabriel looked up almost a shock on his face."Did you say Kit 
Kat?'
>  "Yes " magnus said intriqued.
>    "I must see her. She is important to what has happened. My world 
rests on 
> her."
>   Magnus did not say a word. They strated for the pred base. Before 
they left 
> Magnus told the troops at the ark.."Clear out remains of the ark. 
And make a 
> pile of useful and not useful patrs." he flew off with gabriel over 
his 
> shoulder.
